title: Admission fair begins at International Standard University
body: Admission fair has started at the International Standard University (ISU) for Fall 2021 semester. ISU Vice-Chancellor Prof. Dr. Abdul Awal Khan inaugurated the admission fair at Mohakhali Campus on Monday afternoon. The ISU Vice-Chancellor said that ISU is committed to ensuring international quality education to the students to meet the challenges of the 21st century. Since its inception in 2018, ISU has ensured world-class teachers, modern campuses and various labs for practical education. Even at this time of the Corona epidemic, the academic activities such as online classes, examinations, result publication etc. are being conducted very efficiently and effectively. Admission fair activities will run from 9:00 am to 6:00 pm every day. For those interested in admission to MBA and MA in English programs including BBA, BA (Honâ€™s) in English, BSc in CSE and BSc in Textile Engineering in 14 categories, there are various facilities including minimum 40% to 100% waiver, scholarship. There are also special discounts and attractive gifts. On the inauguration session of the admission fair Fall 2021 Treasurer (Acting) of the University, H. T. M. Quader Newaz, Registrar (ISU), Professor Muhammad Saiful Islam, Dean of the Faculty of Humanities and Social Sciences and Chairman of the English Department k.
